SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into attendance (id, arrivetime, leavetime, note, specialcase, workontime, workofftime, `condition`) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arrivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{leavetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specialcase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{workofftime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{condition,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update attendance set id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, arrivetime = #{arrivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, leavetime = #{leavetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specialcase = #{specialcase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workontime = #{workontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, workofftime = #{workofftime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `condition` = #{condition,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rid = #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select rid, id, arrivetime, leavetime, note, specialcase, workontime, workofftime, `condition` from attendance where rid = #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select rid, id, arrivetime, leavetime, note, specialcase, workontime, workofftime, `condition` from attendance
